mapper.select:
select t.proxyId,t.amtlimit,t.creditlimitamt,t.currency ,t.extralimitamt ,t.lasttime,t.posbacklimit, t.refundlimit, t.remarks,t.surpluslimit,t.usedlimit,t.warnlimt,t.auto_Add_Arrive_Limit as autoAddArriveLimit , t.auto_Add_Trigger_Limit as autoAddTriggerLimit from icpay.proxylimitinfotb t
t.proxyId = #{proxyid}
